job_desc: Assist with salad bar and serving line to ensure the quality of the service and smooth operation. 協助沙拉吧及供餐部之工作，以確保餐廳部之服務品質及運作Responsibilities: 	Ensure all utensils and trays are thoroughly cleaned each day.確保餐廳每日餐盤容器之清潔	Maintain dishwashing machine; ensure dishwashing machine area is kept clean.維護並確認洗碗器具及環境之清潔	Rotate utility cart cleaning duties.輪流執行餐廳部推車之清潔	Cut up vegetables for salad bar. 協助沙拉吧前製食材之準備Requirements: •	Native Mandarin speaker; Fluency in Taiwanese a plus流利中文並具備臺語溝通能力為佳•	At least one years of restaurant experience具備一年以上之餐飲工作經驗•	Knowledge and concept of sanitation具備餐飲衛生之相關知識•	Hardworking, flexible, fast and accurate in completing designated work能準確有效地完成指派之工作項目及內容•	Able to stand for long periods of time可接受長時間站立•	Attention to detail, Attention to detail, especially sanitation能謹慎小心以確保餐飲衛生
